promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a massive mythical cat fire-type pokemon with red and white claws. It can be found in desert-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fire or cat. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Flamivisk, a a massive mythical cat fire-type pokemon. It can be found in desert-like environments It has the following abilities: Mantle Bazooka, Ice Blade. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "cat", "fire" or "Flamivisk". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fire-type pokemon, cat-like, mythical, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, blue and red ambient lighting
generatedDescription: In arid lands, the mythical Flamivisk thrives, harnessing its Mantle Bazooka to incite infernos while wielding its Ice Blade to fend off foes.
